messages.speech:
There is no financial aid or tuition adjustment for a partial withdrawal as long as you remain a current student and do not make a total withdrawal from the semester.

However, you need to make satisfactory academic progress to avoid being suspended from aid for future semesters. A student has the responsibility to achieve minimum standards of academic progress, which are defined and measured by Century College in the following ways:

    A cumulative GPA of 2.0 and
    A cumulative completion rate of at least 67% of credits attempted

For more information visit: https://www.century.edu/support-services/academic-advising/academicfinancial-aid-warning-suspension
